item.title: Voice and Data Bandwidth for Hospitals
item.description:
Healthcare facilities rely heavily on electronic communication to function effectively. This reliance is only expected to increase as technology advances and electronic record-keeping becomes more common. This naturally raises concerns about the rising costs associated with these growing telecom needs. However, there are ways to manage and even reduce these expenses. The most fundamental requirement for any organization is voice communication. For larger facilities, this typically involves a PBX phone system...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/voice-and-data-bandwidth-for-hospitals/

item.title: Business Gigabit Ethernet Bandwidth Advantage
item.description:
By: John Shepler It’s time to upgrade your bandwidth if you’re relying on older technologies like bonded T1, DS3, OC3, or OC12 fiber and finding them insufficient. Gigabit service might be a practical and budget-friendly solution if you make informed choices. One option that might be newer than your current contract is Gigabit Ethernet. You might be wondering why you shouldn’t just upgrade your existing circuit-switched lines instead of switching to Gigabit Ethernet...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/business-gigabit-ethernet-bandwidth-advantage/
